quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.quote: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

quotes.author: Walt Disney
quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.

quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.

quotes.author: Usain Bolt
quotes.quote: I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: The price of success is hard work, dedication to the job at hand, and the determination that whether we win or lose, we have applied the best of ourselves to the task at hand.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.quote: I've missed more than 9,000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. Twenty-six times, I've been trusted to take the game-winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.

quotes.author: Steve Jobs
quotes.quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.quote: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, ambition inspired, and success achieved.

quotes.author: Babe Ruth
quotes.quote: It's hard to beat a person who never gives up.

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.

quotes.author: Michael Phelps
quotes.quote: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.

quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.

quotes.author: Henry Ford
quotes.quote: Whether you think you can, or you think you can't â€” you're right.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.

quotes.author: Maya Angelou
quotes.quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats, so you can know who you are, what you can rise from, how you can still come out of it.

quotes.author: Muhammad Ali
quotes.quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'

quotes.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.

quotes.author: Elon Musk
quotes.quote: Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.

quotes.author: Dwayne Johnson
quotes.quote: Success isn't always about 'greatness'. It's about consistency. Consistent hard work leads to success. Greatness will come.

quotes.author: Malcolm X
quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.

quotes.author: Bill Gates
quotes.quote: Success is a lousy teacher. It seduces smart people into thinking they can't lose.

quotes.author: Michelle Obama
quotes.quote: Success isn't about how much money you make; it's about the difference you make in people's lives.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.quote: The reward of a thing well done is to have done it.

quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
quotes.quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.

quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller
quotes.quote: I do not think that there is any other quality so essential to success of any kind as the quality of perseverance. It overcomes almost everything, even nature.

quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg
quotes.quote: So often in life, things that you regard as an impediment turn out to be great, good fortune.

quotes.author: Bruce Lee
quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.

quotes.author: Coco Chanel
quotes.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.

quotes.author: Dale Carnegie
quotes.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.

quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quotes.quote: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it, as long as you really believe 100 percent.

quotes.author: Cristiano Ronaldo
quotes.quote: Your love makes me strong. Your hate makes me unstoppable.

quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg
quotes.quote: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimes - understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.

quotes.author: John Wooden
quotes.quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.

quotes.author: Serena Williams
quotes.quote: Luck has nothing to do with it because I have spent many, many hours, countless hours, on the court working for my one moment in time, not knowing when it would come.

quotes.author: Warren Buffett
quotes.quote: The more you learn, the more you earn.

quotes.author: Walt Whitman
quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshineâ€”and shadows will fall behind you.

quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.quote: The wound is the place where the light enters you.
